text: Storyhunter, Inc. was founded in 2012 by Jaron Gilinsky in Brooklyn, New York. Alex Ragir joined him as co-founder that same year. ==Overview== Storyhunter is an online marketplace for video production services that matches brands and media companies with filmmakers and journalists using algorithms. Members can use the service to hire, manage, and pay freelance video producers globally. Storyhunter has raised more than $4.2m in venture financing from investors. In 2017 Storyhunter and UNESCO launched a campaign "We Are the Media" at UNESCO’s World Press Freedom Day conference in Jakarta, Indonesia. Storyhunter has media partnerships with Yahoo and AOL Storyhunter works with CNN, Time, National Geographic, Group 9 Media, the Weather Channel, Instagram, Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and Airbnb. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website *Corporate Video Production Category:Companies established in 2012 Category:Video production companies
title: Storyhunter
